main event: Observers at Camp Hood, Texas, reported seeing an orange or yellow light in the sky that appeared to burst into smaller objects after about 2-3 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as being seen at an altitude of approximately 312 miles and 1-1.5 miles away from the observers., The sighting was recorded by military personnel observing from ground level., Observers noted the initial object appeared dull and then burst apart without sound., The sky conditions were overcast at the time of the sighting., The incident was later concluded to possibly be a balloon.
sighted object: an orange or yellow light in the sky
witness description: Military personnel observing from artillery observation posts
